Interface IWithdrawalController

All Known Implementing Classes:
WithdrawalController
public interface IWithdrawalController
Interface defining the contract for managing withdrawal requests from applicants.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addWithdrawal(Withdrawal withdrawal)
    Adds a withdrawal to the system.

    Approves a withdrawal request.

    Gets all withdrawals in the system.

    Retrieves a withdrawal by the applicant.

    Notifies an applicant about their withdrawal status.
    boolean
    rejectWithdrawal(Withdrawal withdrawal)
    Rejects a withdrawal request.
    void
    setWithdrawals(List<Withdrawal> loadedWithdrawals)
    Updates the internal collection of withdrawals from a loaded list.
    Withdrawal
    submitWithdrawal(Applicant applicant, ProjectApplication application)
    Submits a new withdrawal request for an applicant.

  • Method Details

    • submitWithdrawal

      Withdrawal submitWithdrawal(Applicant applicant, ProjectApplication application)
      Submits a new withdrawal request for an applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant requesting the withdrawal
      application - The project application to be withdrawn
      Returns:
      The created Withdrawal object, or null if the withdrawal could not be created

    • approveWithdrawal

      boolean approveWithdrawal(Withdrawal withdrawal)
      Approves a withdrawal request.
      Parameters:
      withdrawal - The withdrawal to be approved
      Returns:
      true if the approval was successful, false otherwise

    • rejectWithdrawal

      boolean rejectWithdrawal(Withdrawal withdrawal)
      Rejects a withdrawal request.
      Parameters:
      withdrawal - The withdrawal to be rejected
      Returns:
      true if the rejection was successful, false otherwise

    • getWithdrawalByApplicant

      Withdrawal getWithdrawalByApplicant(Applicant applicant)
      Retrieves a withdrawal by the applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant whose withdrawal is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      The Withdrawal object associated with the applicant, or null if not found

    • addWithdrawal

      void addWithdrawal(Withdrawal withdrawal)
      Adds a withdrawal to the system.
      Parameters:
      withdrawal - The withdrawal to be added

    • notifyApplicantStatus

      void notifyApplicantStatus(Withdrawal withdrawal)
      Notifies an applicant about their withdrawal status.
      Parameters:
      withdrawal - The withdrawal containing the notification information

    • getAllWithdrawals

      List<Withdrawal> getAllWithdrawals()
      Gets all withdrawals in the system.
      Returns:
      List of all withdrawals

    • setWithdrawals

      void setWithdrawals(List<Withdrawal> loadedWithdrawals)
      Updates the internal collection of withdrawals from a loaded list.
      Parameters:
      loadedWithdrawals - The list of withdrawals loaded from file
